translation.en: [Dib] I used to look up at space
with hope and wonder in my eyes.
Until space looked back.
Invader Zim,
evil, alien soldier of the Irken Empire
sent by his diabolical masters, the Almighty Tallest,
to infiltrate Earth and prepare it for the coming invasion.
Disguised as one of us,
he moved into my neighborhood,
he went to my school,
and with the help of his vile mechanical servants,
plotted to destroy everything we have,
translation.ko: 우리 자신과 우리가 가진 모든 것을

translation.en: -everything we are. -[helicopter whirring]
-[crowd shouting] -And then...
he vanished.
My name is Dib Membrane.
I'm 12 years old.
And I'm all that stands between Zim and the annihilation of our world.
translation.ko: 짐과 우리 세상의 파멸을 막을 사람은 오직 나뿐이지

translation.en: Prepare your starving, gurgling child-bellies
translation.ko: 꼬르륵거리는 위를 가진 배가 몹시 고픈 아이들아

translation.en: for the awesome eventuality of dinner!
Foodio 3000 hopes you love what I have made.
translation.ko: 푸디오 3000은 내 요리가 네 마음에 들었으면 좋겠어

translation.en: Also, what is love?
Looks great, Dad. I'm gonna eat that food.
[Professor Membrane] Hold up now, daughter!
Isn't it time your brother joined us?
Oh, man, no.
Since Zim vanished, Dib's been in his room for, like, a million years.
translation.ko: 오빠는 짐이 사라진 후로 백만 년째 방콕 중이라고요

translation.en: I hardly recognize him anymore.
He just sits there in that chair getting grosser...
translation.ko: 의자에 앉아 있기만 하고 하루하루 더 역겨워지고 있죠

translation.en: smellier.
[Professor Membrane] He sure does, but try to be more understanding.
Dib's finally letting go of his silly obsession
translation.ko: 딥은 마침내 그 멍청한 집착에서 벗어나고 있어

translation.en: with aliens and ghosts and all his other non-scientific nonsense.
translation.ko: 외계인이니 유령이니 하는 비과학적인 망상에서 말이야

translation.en: And it's not easy for him.
Imagine if you stopped believing in, oh, video games.
translation.ko: 네가 비디오 게임에 대한 믿음을 버린다고 상상해봐

translation.en: Don't even joke about that, Dad.
[Professor Membrane] Honey, letting go of silly ideas is just part of growing up.
translation.ko: 멍청한 생각을 버리는 건 성장 과정 중 하나란다, 얘야

translation.en: Why, as a child, I thought sharks were my friends.
translation.ko: 나도 어릴 땐 상어가 내 친구인 줄 알았어

translation.en: [in ominous voice] I know better now.
[in normal voice] So, try to be more supportive. He's your brother, after all.
translation.ko: 그러니 딥을 응원해줘 어쨌든 걘 네 오빠잖니

translation.en: Okay, Dad.
Hey, Dib! Dad says come to dinner!
translation.ko: 어이, 딥! 아빠가 저녁 먹으러 오래!

translation.en: [Dib] You know I can't leave my post, Gaz.
translation.ko: 알잖아, 개즈 난 내 위치를 지켜야 해

translation.en: Just shove the food in here.
Where's the shoving stick? I can't shove without the shoving stick.
translation.ko: 밀기 막대 어디 있지? 그게 있어야 밀어 넣는데

translation.en: [Dib] Zim's still out there, Gaz, so I have to wait
translation.ko: 짐은 아직 지구에 있어 그러니 난 주변을 감시하며...

translation.en: and watch.
No one else will. They could never see the truth.
translation.ko: 남들은 못 해 진실을 못 보니까 하지만 뭐 때문이지?

translation.en: Why, though? Brainwashing?
translation.ko: 진실을 못 보니까 하지만 뭐 때문이지? 세뇌? 마인드 컨트롤?

translation.en: Mind control?
[whispering] Brain-erasing ghosts?
Nobody believes me now, but I'll make them see.
translation.ko: 지금은 아무도 날 안 믿지만 내가 사람들을 눈뜨게 할 거야

translation.en: I'll expose Zim to the world, and open humanity's eyes
translation.ko: 짐의 정체를 세상에 밝혀서 인류에게 진실을 알릴 거라고

translation.en: to the danger they were in all along. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 우리가 그동안 위험에 처해 있었단 사실을

translation.en: Even Dad, world-famous man of science will say,
translation.ko: 그러면 아빠도... 세계적으로 유명한 우리 과학자 아빠도 이러겠지

translation.en: [in strange accent] "I believe you, Dib. I'm sorry I ever doubted you."
That's the worst Dad impression ever,
but, Dib, let it go.
Zim's been gone a long time,
and as far as you know, he might just be gone for good.
translation.ko: 어쩌면 정말로 영영 떠나버린 걸지도 몰라

translation.en: I'd be willing to bet that Zim will never, ever...
translation.ko: 내기를 해도 좋아 내 생각에 짐은 다신 돌아오지...

translation.en: Oh, wait, there he is.
[Dib screeches] It's Zim!
He's back! And he's doing stretches!
Nobody stretches like that unless they're warming up for evil!
translation.ko: 사악한 짓을 하기 전에 몸을 풀고 있는 걸 거야

translation.en: This is it! The... [grunts]
moment I've been... [grunts and crashes]
waiting for!
[Gaz] What are you doing?
[groans] Gotta get to Zim!
Dib, no. Look at you.
translation.ko: 딥, 안 돼! 오빠 상태를 좀 봐!

translation.en: The world's not ready to see what you've become.
translation.ko: 세상은 오빠를 볼 준비가 안 됐어

translation.en: You're hideous!
The smell!
needs me!
-Take a bath first! -[suit alarm blaring]
Take... [gags]
Take a bath!
No!
Zim!
Yes, it is I, and-- Hmm?
-Oh, wait, sorry. -[flies buzzing]
You'll have to move along, hideous goblin.
translation.ko: 미안한데 좀 비켜 못생긴 도깨비 친구

translation.en: I'm posing dramatically for when the Dib shows up.
-I am Dib. -What?
-Give me a sec here. -[stammers] We know each other.
-[thunder claps] -I've been expecting you, Dib!
I can tell. You set up sprinklers and everything.
-[gurgles] -You can't prove anything!
-Anyhow, I-- -Where have you been, Zim?
I've been monitoring your house, the school,
that taco place you love so much.
No, no. GIR loves that place. I think it's dirty.
-[GIR] I ate a baby there. -He did.
What have you been up to, Zim?
Phase one of my evil plan, human.
Phase one.
Computer! Laugh with me! [Computer] I don't want to.
translation.ko: - 컴퓨터, 너도 같이 웃어라 - 전 웃기 싫습니다

translation.en: You've been in your house sitting in the toilet all this time?
translation.ko: 내내 너희 집 화장실 변기 위에 앉아 있었다고?

translation.en: -Yes. -Like, the whole time?
That's right.
Did you have to sit in the toilet?
Do not try to understand the ways of my people, Dib!
translation.ko: 우리 종족의 방식을 이해하려고 하지 마, 딥!

translation.en: From the moment my mission began
translation.ko: 이 끔찍한 행성에서 내 임무가 시작된 순간부터

translation.en: on this horrible planet, you've been there,
translation.ko: 이 끔찍한 행성에서 내 임무가 시작된 순간부터 넌 사사건건 날 방해했지 내 쉬뭅스퀴즈의 스퀴크처럼

translation.en: haunting my every move like a squak in my shmoopsquizz.
translation.ko: 넌 사사건건 날 방해했지 내 쉬뭅스퀴즈의 스퀴크처럼

translation.en: -A what in your huh? -Uh-huh!
And while the rest of your kind were easily fooled,
translation.ko: 네 종족 대부분이 깜빡 속아 넘어갔을 때

translation.en: you were able to see through my brilliant disguise.
translation.ko: 너만은 이 몸의 놀라운 변장을 꿰뚫어 봤어

translation.en: [stammers] Martha!
-[screeches] Eh? -The neighbor boy's an alien!
[stammers] Never mind, Martha. -He's normal. -Okay.
translation.ko: - 신경 쓰지 마, 평범한 애네 - 알았어

translation.en: I knew if I vanished for long enough, you'd just watch and wait,
translation.ko: 내가 오랫동안 모습을 감추면 네가 감시하며 기다릴 줄 알았지

translation.en: your neglected body growing smelly
translation.ko: 돌보지 않은 네 몸이 고약한 냄새를 풍기며

translation.en: -and useless. -[Dib whimpering]
But that was only Phase One of my evil plan.
Well, keep watching, Dookie-Dib. Watch helplessly as I begin...
translation.ko: 계속 지켜봐라, 똥통 딥 아무것도 못 하겠지만 말이야

translation.en: Phase Two!
I'm switching people's mail around.
That's illegal. No!
I'm reading someone's newspaper. I don't pay for a subscription. [laughs]
translation.ko: 난 구독료도 안 내고 남의 신문을 읽고 있어!

translation.en: Nobody reads newspapers anymore, but, no, stop!
translation.ko: 요즘 누가 신문을 봐? 그렇지만 안 돼! 그만둬!

translation.en: Minimoose, get in on this mayhem!
That's my mom's pizza sticker.
She is crazy for pizza.
Hey, what... what are you... Hey, that... that's...
Hey, don't... Wait.
Don't! Don't! Don't!
Excellent.
Me! Me! Let me do one.
I launched that pug into space.
-I thought you liked that pig. -[car alarm goes off]
-Why I do that? -What's the matter, human?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 그랬지? 왜 그래, 인간?

translation.en: Why aren't you stopping me?
Can't fight back.
Sat too long.
Chair fused to butt.
More chair than man now.
Humans are such fragile, goopy things.
No Irken would ever become a chair.
Wait! Was that Phase Two?
Of course it was!
Probably. Uh... You know what? Now I'm not sure.
Either way, you're helpless to stop me, Chair-Dib. So long!
translation.ko: 어쨌든 넌 날 막지 못해 의자 딥, 그동안 즐거웠다!

translation.en: [both] Welcome home, son.
translation.ko: - 잘 왔다, 아들 - 잘 왔다, 아들

translation.en: Zim!
Excellent work, me.
All is going according to plan, but there's still much to do, GIR.
translation.ko: 모든 게 계획대로야 하지만 아직 할 일이 많다, 걸

translation.en: Yes, sir! [shouts]
[shouts] I bloop you, Schmoopsy!
[chuckles warmly] Floopsy...
Computer?
[Computer groans] What?
Open a connection with the Almighty Tallest,
my leaders and biggest fans.
[Computer] Preparing to call The Tallest. You see, GIR, The Tallest--
[Computer] Now calling The Tallest!
The Tallest haven't heard from me,
their greatest and most incredible invader,
translation.ko: 가장 뛰어난 부하이자 가장 놀라운 혁신가인

translation.en: in a very long time.
-They'll be sick with worry. -[GIR squeaks]
Hey, remember Invader Zim?
-Who? -Zim. Tiny?
Screamed a lot?
The guy that sends us the donuts?
No, that's Invader Jim. He's great.
Oh, wait. Zim.
-We hate him! -Yeah, that's him. [chuckles]
translation.ko: - 짜증 나는 녀석 - 그래, 걔 말이야

translation.en: Remember the time we lied and told him
we were sending him on a secret mission to Earth,
translation.ko: 비밀 임무가 있다며 걜 지구로 보내버렸잖아

translation.en: but really we were just getting rid of him because he's awful?
translation.ko: 실은 걔가 사고뭉치라 치워버리고 싶었던 건데

translation.en: [laughs] Yeah. We're hilarious.
[comms officer] My Tallest, there's an incoming transmission.
Yep, life's been pretty great ever since Zim vanished for good.
translation.ko: 짐이 사라진 후로 사는 게 꽤 즐거워졌지

translation.en: Anyhow, send that transmission through.
I wonder who it could ever be. It is I, Zim!
My Tallest, you will be overjoyed to know
Phase One of my most ingenious plan
translation.ko: 두 분의 도착을 대비한 제 천재적인 침략작전의

translation.en: to prepare Earth for your arrival was a success.
translation.ko: 두 분의 도착을 대비한 제 천재적인 침략작전의 1단계가 성공했습니다

translation.en: Zim, we thought you were dead.
translation.ko: 짐, 우린 네가 죽은 줄 알았는데?

translation.en: Could a dead Zim do this?
translation.ko: 제가 죽었다면 이런 걸 할 수 있을까요?

translation.en: [clears throat] Sirs, my Earthly arch-nemesis is now a sad chair,
translation.ko: 제 지구인 숙적은 불쌍한 의자가 됐습니다

translation.en: leaving me free to complete the most diabolical phase of my plan,
translation.ko: 이제 전 녀석의 방해 없이 침략작전의 가장 사악한 단계인

translation.en: Phase Two,
wherein I, uh...
Computer, put them on hold. Oh, no.
translation.ko: 컴퓨터, 대기 음악 틀어 큰일 났네 침략작전 2단계가 뭐였더라

translation.en: I really can't remember what Phase Two is.
I must have sat in that toilet too long. Think, Zim. Think.
translation.ko: 화장실에 너무 오래 있었나 봐 생각해, 짐, 생각해내

translation.en: We don't care, Zim.
[grunts] Why didn't I write it down?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 안 써뒀나 몰라, 잠깐!

translation.en: Wait! Computer,
translation.ko: 내가 왜 안 써뒀나 몰라, 잠깐! 컴퓨터, 내가 침략작전 2단계를 언급한 녹화분 아무거나 틀어봐

translation.en: play back any recordings of me discussing Phase Two.
translation.ko: 컴퓨터, 내가 침략작전 2단계를 언급한 녹화분 아무거나 틀어봐

translation.en: [Computer] One recording found.
Would you like me to record any and all mention of Phase Two?
No, thank you. Zim forgets nothing.
translation.ko: 아니, 됐어 짐은 모든 걸 기억하니까

translation.en: Hmm, besides reminding me how cool I look and sound,
translation.ko: 내 멋진 모습이 담겨 있긴 하지만

translation.en: that was of no help.
He knows we can still see and hear him, right?
translation.ko: 지금도 다 보이고 들린다는 거 알겠지?

translation.en: I liked when he was dead.
[shouts excitedly] I remember Phase Two!
You do? Good work, GIR! Tell me.
You gonna order a million pizzas,
and then I gotta roll around in them pizzas,
translation.ko: 그럼 난 그 피자들을 내 몸에 둘둘 말 거야

translation.en: and that's the story about how I turn into a giant pizza.
translation.ko: 내가 거대한 피자로 변하게 되는 이야기지

translation.en: This isn't the time for the giant pizza story, GIR.
translation.ko: 지금은 거대한 피자를 얘기할 때가 아냐, 걸

translation.en: And that will never happen!
Silence! I need to think! Just calm down and...
translation.ko: 조용히 해! 난 생각을 해야 한다고, 진정해

translation.en: Computer, did you put The Tallest on hold?
-[Computer] Nope. -[screams]
I don't think they heard anything. Yes, they did.
I am Irk's finest Invader.
If The Tallest find out I failed to dominate the Earth
because I forgot Phase Two,
who knows what they'll do?
[Almighty Tallest Red] Invader Zim,
you were once our best, most amazing Invader,
translation.ko: 넌 한때 우리 종족 중 가장 뛰어난 스파이였지만

translation.en: but now, you're dumb.
Also, stupid.
As punishment, you will be stripped of your Invader rank,
translation.ko: 실패에 대한 처벌로 네 스파이 지위를 박탈하고

translation.en: re-encoded as nothing.
But you can't! I am Zim!
[Almighty Tallest Red] Control Brains, re-encode.
[Control Brains] Re-encoding.
It is done, My Tallest.
Zim, you will live out
translation.ko: 짐 넌 이제 네 불쌍한 생의 남은 나날을 그 모습으로...

translation.en: the rest of your long, sad days as--
translation.ko: 넌 이제 네 불쌍한 생의 남은 나날을 그 모습으로...

translation.en: -[crowd cheers] -Wait, no, never mind.
GIR, time is of the essence. -The Tallest could be here any day now... -[gasps]
...and Dib won't stay a chair forever.
translation.ko: 딥도 언젠간 그 의자에서 일어날 거야

translation.en: Go to my scheming lab, and bring me everything that could be Phase Two.
translation.ko: 내 계획실로 가서 2단계와 관련돼 보이는 건 다 들고 와

translation.en: -Quickly! -[squeals]
Useless dookie!
I need more time to remember Phase Two.
Computer, how much longer do I have before The Tallest arrive?
translation.ko: 컴퓨터, 톨리스트께서 오실 때까지 얼마나 남았지?

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Computer] Information unknown. Unacceptable.
Access The Tallest's computers and retrieve their flight plan.
translation.ko: 톨리스트님들의 컴퓨터에 접속해 비행 계획을 확보해

translation.en: [Computer imitating British accent] Ooh, yes, right away, sir.
[Zim] Are you doing an accent?
[Computer in normal accent] I get bored.
P.S. There is insufficient power to access the flight plan.
Then find more power, and be sneaky about it.
translation.ko: 그럼 전력을 더 끌어 와 눈에 띄지 않게 몰래

translation.en: [Computer] Activating sneaky mode.
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
Sneaking!
[Computer] Flight plan retrieved.
[Zim] Along this line is every world the Irken Armada plans to conquer,
translation.ko: 이 선 주변의 행성들이 얼켄 함대가 정복할 세계다

translation.en: but where's Earth?
The Tallest said it was the most important mission of all.
Computer, zoom out.
[Computer] Zooming out.
Keep zooming out until you find out
translation.ko: 계속 줌 아웃 해봐 함대와 지구의 거리를 알아낼 수 있을 때까지

translation.en: how far The Tallest are from Earth.
translation.ko: 함대와 지구의 거리를 알아낼 수 있을 때까지

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out.
Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
-Hurry it up. -Zooming out.
-Zooming out. -Vámonos!
I must begin Phase Two
before Dib gets back into annoying fighting shape.
translation.ko: 딥이 체력을 회복해 성가시게 반격하기 전에

translation.en: [Computer] Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
Hmm, I'm sure it's there,
translation.ko: 줌 아웃 저기 어딘가에 있을 텐데

translation.en: -somewhere. -Zooming out.
Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out. Zooming out.
I was in bad shape, then I got too in shape,
now I'm back to normal shape.
Oh, man, Dib, not the coat.
translation.ko: 그건 아냐, 딥 그 코트 구리다니까

translation.en: It makes me look mysterious.
Now, step aside. I've got a Zim to stop.
translation.ko: 그럼, 비켜 난 짐을 막으러 가야 해

translation.en: All right, test children.
These bracelets are just prototypes,
translation.ko: 이 브레이스릿은 견본이니까 에너지장이 작동할 동안

translation.en: so try not to breathe or think while the energy field is--
translation.ko: 이 브레이스릿은 견본이니까 에너지장이 작동할 동안 숨을 쉬거나 생각하지 않도록...

translation.en: -[Dib grunts] -What? Oh.
Behold, my boy child!
I can't remember the last time I saw you this excited about science.
translation.ko: 네가 과학에 이런 관심을 보이는 건 정말 오랜만이구나

translation.en: Huh?
My new Peace Day edition Membracelet.
Tomorrow at my big keynote event, I reveal it to the world.
translation.ko: 내일, 신제품 발표에서 이걸 세상에 공개할 거야

translation.en: And when Peace Day comes,
the children of the Earth will hold hands and...
translation.ko: 지구의 어린이들이 손에 손을 잡고... 잠깐

translation.en: The alien-hunting briefcase?
Oh, son.
Not this nonsense again.
Dad, trying to save the Earth from Zim's alien evil is not nonsense.
translation.ko: 지구를 사악한 외계인 짐에게서 지키는 건 허튼짓이 아녜요, 아빠
